channel.title: Episode 18: "Special Guest: Chase Clemons"
channel.description:
[http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-18-special-guest-chase-clemons-on-bootstrapped-support/][1]
Ian and Andrey sit down with special guest [Chase Clemons][2] of [SupportOps][3] and 37signals, to discuss customer service for bootstrappers.
[1]: http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-18-special-guest-chase-clemons-on-bootstrapped-support/ [2]: https://twitter.com/chaseclemons [3]: http://supportops.co/

item.title: Episode 18: "Special Guest: Chase Clemons"
item.dc:creator: imsickofmaps
item.description:
hah! Never mind, the content was worth pressing through for. Loved the feedback about avoiding certain types of support channels. Great when other people experiment with these alternatives and can bring a reality check.

Read full topic

item.title: Episode 18: "Special Guest: Chase Clemons"
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Yeah this was our worst audio, he was 20ft from mic, I was traveling and on a bogus headset next week it’ll be perfect.

It was a brand new mic! I was just too far away from it.

item.title: Episode 18: "Special Guest: Chase Clemons"
item.dc:creator: imsickofmaps
item.description:
I’ve started listening to this episode but not finished yet… however, can we start a tip jar to buy @andrey a new mic setup? You sound like you’re on the toilet in this one!
